name: Let's play Poker Face
description:
It's Halloween time, and you can celebrate with the Kakegurui girls !! However, will it be all fun and game, or will there be tricks and mysteries to uncover? Find out by playing Let's play Poker Face - Halloween Minigame, when you the player enter into Hyakkaou Prrivate Academy on Halloween! However something seems wrong, something seems off....

Thank you for looking and downloading this game! Please remember to leave a rating and telling me what you liked about it so I can improve in the future ! 

Love you all !! :3
